display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Will of the Controller F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to inflict moderate psionic damage and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 5 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Controllers and may be slotted into most control powers and requires the user to be level 50.
display_short_help: Set: Superior Will of the Controller
